text: David Greczek (born October 29, 1994) is an American professional soccer player who plays as a goalkeeper for Greenville Triumph SC in USL League One. ==Career== ===College and youth=== Greczek grew up in Fairfield Township, Essex County, New Jersey and attended West Essex High School. He played four years of college soccer at Rutgers University between 2013 and 2016.David Greczek, Rutgers Scarlet Knights men's soccer. Accessed April 24, 2017. While at college, Greczek also appeared for USL PDL side Jersey Express in 2016.http://www.uslpdl.com/news_article/show/658366?referrer_id=2242498 ===Professional=== On January 17, 2017, Greczek was drafted in the third-round (58th overall) during the 2017 MLS SuperDraft by Sporting Kansas City.https://www.sportingkc.com/post/2017/01/17/sporting-kc-selects- goalkeeper-david-greczek-third-round-mls-superdraft He signed with Kansas City's United Soccer League affiliate club Swope Park Rangers on February 8, 2017. ==References== == External links == * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Rutgers Scarlet Knights men's soccer players Category:Jersey Express S.C. players Category:Sporting Kansas City II players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Soccer players from New Jersey Category:Sporting Kansas City draft picks Category:USL League Two players Category:USL Championship players Category:People from Fairfield Township, Essex County, New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Essex County, New Jersey Category:West Essex High School alumni Category:American soccer players Category:FC Motown players Category:Greenville Triumph SC players
title: David Greczek
